column1: Wha'evah, wha'evah! You fuckin' cocksuckers don't know shit! Fuck you!
Wha'evah! Maury, my mom don't know shit! You could aks her! I aks her all my homies that they be down wit it. You know, it's all good shit.  Fuck you, cocksuckuhs!
Shu' up! Shut the fuck  up, you God-aweful skank!
Shut up, skank, he's not talkin' to you!
Oh, what-evah. You ain't tough, ho! I roam with gangs!
What Evah! You ain't bad! You ain't nothin'! I ditch class and go shoot heroin in the school bathroom!
Whatevah. I helped in a drive-by shooting.
